freenet.support.io
Class Closer

java.lang.Object
  freenet.support.io.Closer

public class Closer
extends Object

Closes various resources. The resources are checked for being null before being closed, and every possible execption is swallowed. That makes this class perfect for use in the finally blocks of try-catch-finally blocks.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
David ‘Roden’ <bombe@freenetproject.org>
